entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 10 April 2023
